# React TypeScript repo audit (2026-03-01 00:46Z)

_**User**_

Audit this React+TypeScript repo for pre-PR cleanup opportunities. Focus on code reuse opportunities, bad practices, and code smells. Prioritize findings in files likely touched recently: src/app/components/Editor.tsx, EditorToolbar.tsx, Login.tsx, DocumentList.tsx, DocumentCard.tsx, plus any shared ui/util files. Return:
1) High/medium/low findings list with file paths and why it matters before merge
2) Specific refactor suggestions emphasizing code reuse and maintainability
3) Quick wins vs larger refactors
4) Mention any dead imports, duplicated logic, event-listener leaks, brittle DOM manipulation, accessibility regressions from code structure, and typing issues.

---

_**Agent (model gpt-5.3-codex, mode Agent)**_
